content.question: The score is printed correctly, but in the version you will hear, there are errors in pitch that create a voice-leading error. Which of the following voice-leading errors occurs?

choices.label: Parallel fifths between the bass and soprano
Parallel octaves between the bass and soprano
More than three consecutive thirds between the soprano and alto
More than three consecutive sixths between the soprano and alto

content.answer: More than three consecutive thirds between the soprano and alto

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Apply knowledge of musical symbols and terms to detect discrepancies in pitch and rhythm when comparing notated and performed music in one or two voices.
